description:
Mamma mia, this pack is fire! Tame the Ferrari Roma, the ATS Automobili Corsa RRTurbo, and the ItalDesign DaVinci to blast your way through the Heatwave Season. Who says beauties cannot also be beasts?

This pack contains:
• Blueprints to unlock the Ferrari Roma
• Blueprints to unlock the ATS Automobili Corsa RRTurbo
• Blueprints to unlock and star up the ItalDesign DaVinci
• 1,500,000 Credits
• 1,500 Tokens
name: Asphalt 9: Legends Turbo Summer Racing Pack
